sentences.sentence: I faxed a first draft of this article to him.
sentences.translation: 我把这篇文章的初稿传真给他。

sentences.sentence: I faxed a copy of the agreement to each of the investors.
sentences.translation: 我给每位投资者都传真了一份协议副本。

sentences.sentence: I faxed the list of hotels through to them.
sentences.translation: 我把旅馆名单传真给了他们。
